plot outline: Prasad is a Nepali social drama about two newlywed couples struggling to conceive a baby. The film portrays how lower class people are intimidated by powerful people and the wife's fight to raise a baby born because of accidental sexual intercourse.
title: Prasad
plot: Newly married couple face a lot of challenges when they find out they can't conceive.

_Prasad_ (qv) is a Nepali social drama about two newlywed couples struggling to conceive a baby. The film portrays how lower class people are intimidated by powerful people and the wife's fight to raise a baby born because of accidental sexual intercourse.
